oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Barcode and voice recognition techniques for data entry into computerized dairy database records
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Eilts, Bruce E.
Paccamonti, Dale L.
Holmes, Robert A.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: data input
computerized system
barcode
voice recognition
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Even though computers operate at amazing speeds, data input into programs remains the rate-limiting step preventing many dairymen and veterinarians from adopting a computerized system. Keyboard entry of individual animal events into a computer program is extremely tedious, but present barcode and voice recognition technologies exist to ease this cumbersome task.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; 1995; 244
